WD01-001.name: Tamayorihime, Full Moon Miko
WD01-001.description: {Constant} As long as there is a “Romail, Helmet Armor” is on your field, all of your SIGNI get +2000 power.

WD01-006.name: Rococo Boundary
WD01-006.description: [Timing: Main Phase] Return up to two of your opponent's SIGNI to their hand

WD01-007.name: Avon
WD01-007.description: [Timing: Main Phase] Search your deck for two white SIGNI, reveal them, and add them to your hand. Your deck is then shuffled.

WD01-008.name: Baroque Defense
WD01-008.description: [Timing: Attack Phase] Until the end of the turn, one of your opponent's LRIG OR one of your opponent's SIGNI cannot attack.

WD01-009.name: Romail, Helmet Armor
WD01-009.description: {Constant} During your opponent's turn, all your SIGNI get +1000 power.
WD01-009.burst: Return one of your opponent's SIGNI to their hand.

WD01-011.name: Tourette, Gauntlet
WD01-011.description: {On-Play} (W) Search your deck for one "Romail, Helmet Armor", reveal it, and add it to your hand. Your deck is then shuffled.

WD01-014.name: Bonya, Small Bow
WD01-014.description: {On-Play} Look at the top three cards of your deck, then return them in any order you choose.

WD01-015.name: Get Bible
WD01-015.description: Search your deck for one SIGNI, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Your deck is then shuffled.

WD01-016.name: Servant D
WD01-016.description:
[Guard]: Discard this card to negate a LRIG's attack once.
{Constant} [Multi-Ener]: When paying a cost, this card may count as any color.

WD01-017.name: Servant O
WD01-017.description:
[Guard]: Discard this card to negate a LRIG's attack once.
{Constant} [Multi-Ener]: When paying a cost, this card may count as any color.
